channel.title: BIG HAIR HOCKEY TALK SHOW | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: We are NHL hockey writers who put away their pens to talk about our favorite subject hockey but from a big hair perspective. Bring some Aqua Net and join us with our live shows. We cover everything!

item.title: Big Hair Hockey Talk Show STANLEY CUP FINALS EDITION (Ep 13/ Playoffs 09) - May 31,2009
item.description:
Join us as we preview the Pittsburgh Penguins and Detroit Red Wings matchup. Marie B (http://www.booktoots.wordpress.com) who blogs about the Detroit Red Wings will be joining us to talk about the team. Audio bytes on Sidney Crosby talking about whacking, Dan Blysma and his thoughts about the loss and those weird bounces from the boards of Joe Louis Arena. Could the Penguins do more to win? This and much more on the Stanley Cup Finals Edition.

NHL | hockey | Pittsburgh Penguins | Detroit Red Wings | Stanley Cup Finals

item.title: Eastern Conference Finals Special Edition (Episode 12/ Playoffs 09) - May 20,2009
item.description:
Join us as we interview a panel of bloggers who write about the Carolina Hurricanes - David from RedBlackHockey (http://www.kuklaskorner.com/index.php/rbh/) and Pittsburgh Penguins with Pat from Igloo Dreams (http://igloodreams.blogspot.com) our Eastern Conference Big Hair Finals Edition.

item.title: Western Conference Big Hair Hockey Talk Show Finals Edition Ep.11/Playoff 09 - May 17,2009
item.description:
Join us as we interview a panel of bloggers who write for the Detroit Red Wings and the Chicago Blackhawks on our Western Conference Playoff Finals Edition -- Marie B, bloggers from Booktoots Weblog (http://www.booktoots.wordpress.com; Mike Mouat from the Detroit Red Wings Examiner (http://www.examiner.com/x-1405-Detroit-Red-Wings-Examiner); Paul Banks from The Sportsbank.net (http://www.thesportsbank.net) and NBC ChicagoSports.com. Find out more on which team will proceed to the Stanley Cup Finals.

Detroit Red Wings | Chicago Blackhawks | NHL | Western Conference | hockey
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Big Hair Hockey Talk Show (Anaheim Ducks Edition) Ep 10/Playoffs 09 - May 08,2009
item.description:
Adam Brady from the Anaheim Ducks.com will join us in to talk about team's stellar performance in the NHL Western Conference Finals. He is director of Publications and New Media for the Anaheim Ducks and Honda Center. We will be discussing the playoff series with the Detroit Red Wings.

NHL | Anaheim Ducks | Red Wings | Detroit | hair

item.title: Big Hair Hockey Talk Show (Blackhawk/Canucks Edition) Episode 9/Playoffs 08-09 - May 03,2009
item.description:
It's panel discussion time again on the Big Hair Hockey Talk Show. Joining us is Canucks Hockey Blog writer, JJ Guerrero (http://www.canuckshockeyblog.com). Also joining us Paul Banks from The Sports Bank.Net (http://www.sportsbank.net) who is also an NBC Chicago Sports.com writer and Matthew who writes for Second City Hockey, an SB Nation blog (http://www.secondcityhockey.net).

Blackhawks | Canucks | playoffs | NHL | Chicago

item.title: Big Hair Hockey Talk Show Episode 8/Playoffs 09 (Charity/Slap Shot Edition) - Apr 26,2009
item.description:
Interview with Dave Hanson, author of Slap Shot Original: The Man, The Foil, The Legend. We will be discussing the book with the actor and hockey player of the cult classic, Slap Shot. We will also discuss charity pursuits.

slapshot | paul newman | minor league hockey | charity | author

item.title: Big Hair Hockey Talk Show (ROAD TRIP EDITION) Ep. 7/Playoffs 09 - Apr 19,2009
item.description:
Join us as we take a trip up I-81 to the Central Pennsylvania depot of future Penguins. This is a live reality talk blog show. We will interview a guest star and freelance writer who specializes in the American Hockey League. She will provide input about the future of the Penguins. It doesn't get as real as this show!

road trip | philadelphia | pittsburgh penguins | ahl | nhl

item.title: Big Hair Hockey Show (STANLEY CUP MUSIC EDITION) Episode 6/08-09 Season - Apr 12,2009
item.description:
We are preparing for the Stanley Cup Finals while everyone else is on an Easter Hunt or watching baseball. Join us for the greatest music to make the Stanley Cup. Did you know that Don Cherry could sing? Find out more on the Stanley Cup Music Edition.

music | hockey | stanley cup | nhl | Don Cherry

item.title: BIG HAIR HOCKEY TALK SHOW (Minor League Edition) Episode 5/Season 08-09 - Apr 05,2009
item.description:
Have you ever thought of owning your own hockey team? I'm not talking fantasy hockey but a real team with dressing room and players included. In this minor league episode, Eastern Professional Hockey League Commissioner Jim Riggs will join us with Josh Brown, EPHL league expansion expert. http://www.ephl.com Find out more about what it takes to make it in the minors. Highlight audio reel of the AHL, fan interviews.

AHL | hockey | EPHL | Baby Pens | NHL

item.title: ATTENTION HOCKEY BLOGGERS, JOURNALISTS AND FANS - Mar 28,2009
item.description:
What is puck management?

Please send in your definition to chicshockey@yahoo.com
or leave it here on the comment page. 

It is time to add it on the Urban Dictionary! 





puck management | NHL hockey | blogs | journalists | fans | AHL | OHL

or leave it here on the comment page.

item.title: Big Hair Hockey Talk Show (April Preview Edition) Episode 4/08-09 - Mar 28,2009
item.description:
In this edition, we preview the New York Rangers and Pens game with press conference audio courtesy of the NHL. We talk about the use of social media in hockey and twitter, future book review on Alyssa Milano's Safe at Home, Dave Hanson from Slapshot email and of course Sean Avery. BLOGGERS, HOCKEY JOURNALISTS AND FANS PLEASE SEND IN YOUR DEFINITION OF PUCK MANAGEMENT TO chicshockey@yahoo.com. We need to enter it in the URBAN DICTIONARY. Audio on Dan Blysma, Petr Sykora, Chris Kunitz and Sidney talking about Britney Spears.

NHL | sports | New York Rangers | pittsburgh | hockey

item.title: New Twitter Account - Mar 26,2009
item.description:
I gave in and opened a twitter account. 

I confess that I was afraid that I would wind up a bit hockey obsessed, but I had to join before Stanley Cup playoffs. 

Please follow me on my show as I follow Malkin in Russian and Ovechkin (if I can find him on twitter) at http://www.twitter.com/chicshockey

See you there! 


NHL | twitter | blogs | email | hockey | talk radio | Big Hair | hocket show

item.title: Big Hair Hockey Show (Penguins Edition) (Flyers Edition) Episode 3/Season 08-09 - Mar 22,2009
item.description:
Biggest matchup of the season pregame show! This time featuring Igloo Dreams blogger (http://www.igloodreams.blogspot.com) and Frozen Fan blogger. Frozen Fan joins us with her latest input on the Flyers matchup today. Check out the blog at http://www.frozenfan.wordpress.com Guys, Double Edition day never seemed so sweeter. Sound clips courtesy of the NHL on Ovechkin and Sids. John Stevens, coaching interview, on the Flyers emotional play. Our bloggers add in their own thoughts about the playoff run! Thanks for joining in callers.

hockey | nhl | sports | pittsburgh penguins | philadelphia flyers

item.title: BIG HAIR HOCKEY TALK SHOW (Pittsburgh Edition) (Bruins Edition) Episode 2/ Season 08-09 - Mar 15,2009
item.description:
Interviewing Pittsburgh children's author Howard Shapiro. He'll talk about his book, Hockey Days and his latest installment Hockey Player for Life. Pregame wrapup with more audio bytes before the Bruins and Penguins game. Special guest star from 43whitneyproductions.com, the guy from the NESN hotspots, I'm Into Bruins.

author | NHL | Pittsburgh | Penguins | books
